result: import{setDate,getDay,subDays,addDays,getDaysInMonth,eachDay,setDay}from'date-fns';export function makeDays(date){var selectedDate=setDate(date,1);var daysInMonth=getDaysInMonth(date);var weekday=getDay(selectedDate);var startDate=subDays(selectedDate,weekday);var days=Math.ceil((weekday+daysInMonth)/7)*7-1;var endDate=addDays(startDate,days);return eachDay(startDate,endDate);}var weekdayFormat=new window.Intl.DateTimeFormat(undefined,{weekday:'short'});export function formatWeekday(weekday){var date=setDay(new Date(),weekday);return weekdayFormat.format(date);}var monthFormat=new window.Intl.DateTimeFormat(undefined,{month:'long'});export function formatMonth(date){return monthFormat.format(date);}
